headline: Inside ABC News’s Decision to Oust a Longtime Correspondent
summary: Executives at  Disney’s  ABC News woke up Sunday morning to a social-media firestorm that put them in the Trump administration’s crosshairs.  Terry Moran,  who worked at ABC since 1997, had posted a lengthy message on X just after midnight Sunday attacking a top Trump aide and the president himself.  The post further strained the network’s relationship with Trump, months after it agreed to a $15 million settlement with him over a defamation lawsuit involving star anchor  George Stephanopoulos.

raw.headline: Inside ABC News’s Decision to Oust a Longtime Correspondent

headline: Can you spot the fake? The AI ‘bootlegs’ that have infuriated Disney
summary: Disney and Universal have filed a lawsuit against a tech firm that creates AI-generated images of characters including Shrek and the Minions.
